version_description: Our housekeeping team has cleaned up the Hyatt app so it’s faster and better than ever.

- Room keys go mobile! Mobile Entry is now available at Grand Hyatt San Francisco but rolling out to more hotels soon.
- Can’t remember your username? The Hyatt mobile app will now remember it for you for easy sign-in.
- And more! We’re always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.

Track your membership milestones! See your progress to the next member tier and how many more Hyatt brand stays till you earn your free night award.

Want to share your trip plans? Send your reservation details straight from the app via email, SMS, and more.

Navigate with ease. Just swipe left instead of hitting the back button to get to a previous screen.

We've also fixed an issue where some users were not able to select the Find Hotels button when searching for hotels.

· Planning your next trip? You can now view a list of all of Hyatt hotels and resorts globally.
· Additional bug fixes and improvements.
Fixes a bug that caused the app to crash occasionally when selecting children's ages.

- See member benefits: View World of Hyatt member perks right from the app.
- Security simplified: You can now use Touch ID with Mobile Entry to access your room.
- Forgot your member number? We have new options to get you signed in.

- Stay all-inclusive: Earn and redeem World of Hyatt points at all-inclusive Hyatt Ziva and Hyatt Zilara resorts.
- Get set up: We've made it easier to activate your World of Hyatt account and create your password.
- And more! We're always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.

- Filter hotels and resorts: View by Hyatt brand or World of Hyatt award category (redeem your free nights!).  
- Keep your personal info updated: Manage your username and email address in the app's account settings. 
- And more! We're always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.

- We've fixed some display issues for past activity and past transactions
- And more! We're always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.

- Map it out: Use our new interactive map feature to explore Hyatt hotels and resorts worldwide.
- And more! We're always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.

- Map it out: Use our new interactive map feature to explore Hyatt hotels and resorts worldwide.
- And more! We're always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes
Bug fixes and improvements
Minor enhancements
We’re always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.

- Change of plans? You can now modify your reservations right from the app.
- You can see the add-ons you've purchased on your reservation details. (Psst - stay tuned for more).
- You can now search for Miraval and Small Luxury Hotels of the World properties right from the app. We've also fixed a Miraval price display issue.

• Get credit: Submit a request to claim your World of Hyatt points for a recent stay at Hyatt.
• Pamper yourself: Explore and book unique treatments and therapies at Hyatt spas during your stay.
• Don’t want to miss an episode? Use Google Chromecast to stream content to your in-room television. We’ve expanded to additional hotels, with more on the way!
• And more! We’re always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.

• Need help finding the perfect hotel? You can now filter hotels by amenity in our Hotels & Resorts list.
• Get the communications you need. Manage notification preferences in the app to make sure you get check-in notifications, room ready notifications and more.
• Bug fixes and improvements.

· Filter hotels and resorts: View hotels by amenity, brand, or World of Hyatt award category (redeem your free nights!).
· Plan with ease: View your recent searches to quickly resume trip planning.
· Not another password! Enable Touch ID and/or Face ID for secure and easy logging in.

We've simplified account management:
You can now manage your stored credit cards with ease
Plus you can store your room preferences to your World of Hyatt account
We've also simplified logging on - after you've logged on once, we'll remember your last name so you don't have to!

And because we love our work, we've added copy-to-pasteboard for the most important information in the app.

We've simplified account management:
You can now manage your stored credit cards with ease
Plus you can store your room preferences to your World of Hyatt account
We've also simplified logging on - after you've logged on once, we'll remember your last name so you don't have to!

And because we love our work, we've added copy-to-pasteboard for the most important information in the app.
We’re always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.
We’re always improving with additional enhancements and bug fixes.

- You can now add Corporate/Group codes to your profile in the Personal section. These codes will prepopulate when searching for hotels to make sure you get the correct rate.

- You can manage your Home and Business addresses in your account contact information to streamline the checkout process.

We’ve made hotel search functionality even easier. You can now search for hotels using your recent searches, favorite hotels, or by rebooking one of your past stays.

We’ve also made a number of minor bug fixes and improvements.

We’ve made hotel search functionality even easier. You can now search for hotels using your recent searches, favorite hotels, or by rebooking one of your past stays.

We’ve also made a number of minor bug fixes and improvements.

We've made managing the emails you receive from Hyatt even easier: Manage your email preferences in your Account settings.

We've also made a number of minor bug fixes and improvements.

• We’ve made it easier to use Chromecast with your TV.
• We’ve streamlined how biometrics work when you’ve changed your password.
• We’ve simplified storing new credit cards to your profile.
• We’ve clarified the error messages you might see when joining whilst booking, though we hope you never see them!

All this along with the various minor improvements and fixes we are constantly making to improve your experience.

Thank you, Veterans and Military Members

Participating Hyatt hotels in the U.S. are honoring veterans, active duty armed service members and their immediate family members. To check availability, select the Veteran special rate option when booking.

- Change of plans? You can now modify your reservations right from the app.
- You can see the add-ons you've purchased on your reservation details. (Psst - stay tuned for more).
- You can now search for Miraval and Small Luxury Hotels of the World properties right from the app. We've also fixed a Miraval price display issue.

• Reservation add-ons are now available at participating hotels. You can guarantee an early arrival, request a welcome snack or even make a cabana reservation.
• Looking for the latest headlines? Now with inkl, you can access complimentary premium news content from the world's top sources during your next stay. Available at participating hotels.
• We've made some improvements to Hyatt Mobile Entry to help you get to your room even faster.

• Reservation add-ons are now available at participating hotels. You can guarantee an early arrival, request a welcome snack or even make a cabana reservation.
• Looking for the latest headlines? Now with inkl, you can access complimentary premium news content from the world's top sources during your next stay. Available at participating hotels.
• We've made some improvements to Hyatt Mobile Entry to help you get to your room even faster.

• An updated account page highlights World of Hyatt membership benefits at-a-glance
• A newly designed account activity section features progress toward tier status and Milestone Rewards
• Now search and book stays at Thompson Hotels, the first of several new brands being added to World of Hyatt

• An updated account page highlights World of Hyatt membership benefits at-a-glance
• A newly designed account activity section features progress toward tier status and Milestone Rewards
• Now search and book stays at Thompson Hotels, the first of several new brands being added to World of Hyatt

• Now search and book stays at Thompson Hotels, the first of several new brands being added to World of Hyatt

• New Brands - Now members can search, book and earn benefits for stays at most Joie de Vivre and Thompson Hotels, with Alila hotels and Destination Hotels set to follow later this year.
• New Rewards - Now your journeys can be even more rewarding. From takeoff to checkout, elite members of World of Hyatt and American Airlines AAdvantage® can now earn more for both flights and hotel stays.
We fixed an issue that prevented hotel maps from displaying.

Our app has been upgraded with you in mind – including a new look and new features. Explore and book stays at over 900 hotels and resorts around the world with ease.

Your Trip Planning - With the new app, you’ll be able to search hotels, check out special offers, book and modify reservations, review room charges, and check-in and out on the go.

Your Stay - Request items to your room with the touch of a button. Cast your favorite shows right to your TV with Chromecast*. Unlock your room with Hyatt Mobile Entry*. With our new app, everything is just a swipe away.

Your Account - Track everything from your points balance and awards to your progress towards tier status and now, Milestone Rewards, with the touch of a button.

*Availability of these features varies by hotel.

• Your travel possibilities continue to grow with the addition of several Destination locations including Seattle, Scottsdale and more
• We’ve made a number of performance improvements throughout the app, and general improvements to Hyatt Mobile Entry
• We’ve fixed issues associated with FaceID, with submitting Guest Requests and with some users getting logged out of the app

• We’ve made some updates to support iOS 13.
• Now access and book all new hotels with upcoming opening dates and view local contact numbers.

-Live Chat with a Hyatt Specialist who can care for everything from booking your next dream vacation to sharing the amazing benefits you'll get as you progress with World of Hyatt
-Fixed a few bugs with our new Housekeeping Preference feature that's coming soon to even more Hyatt hotels
-Refreshed our World of Hyatt icon in and around the app
-Fixed a bug that could cause the app to crash on launch in certain, rare, instances
-Each update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make our App even better for you

-We've been making a series of sweeping changes to dramatically speed up our app launch times, removing a ton of friction from the experience.
-Updates to our Housekeeping Preference feature to support certain regions with more specific housekeeping requirements
-Fixed a bug that could prevent guests from not seeing in-stay feedback
-Updated our web views to use the more modern WebKit view.
-Each update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make our App even better for you

-Housekeeping Preference -- During check-in you can view and/or select your preference for housekeeping during your stay (North American hotels now, more regions coming soon)
-Updated translations
-A number of bug fixes and performance enhancements

-Updated translations
-Updates to support for our new Caption by Hyatt brand (coming soon)
-We've made several small updates and bug fixes to give you a great experience with the app

-Several changes "under the hood" to optimize performance and give you a great app experience.
-Fixed a crash that could occasionally happen on the home screen for certain members.
-Happy Holidays! We can't wait to see you in 2021.

- We’ve updated some of our fonts for improved legibility throughout our app.
- We’ve improved the performance of both our digital key and of our Headspace mindfulness exercises.
-We've fixed a few bugs to improve the performance of our app for you

-A brand new look and feel on your account, and more
